title: Steve Harvey
description:
Host, businessman, and comedic powerhouse Steve Harvey joins Kevin Hart to talk about being homeless while starting out in comedy, how multiple sources of income have kept him on his feet, and how the legacy of the Kings of Comedy lives on today.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (steve harvey, kevin hart)
